snippet: Anthony D. Weiner’s policy guide was similar to one he issued before he abandoned a 2009 run for mayor and before his sex-message scandal.
abstract: Anthony D Weiner releases a 21-page policy guide similar to one he issued in 2008, before he abandoned a 2009 run for New York City mayor and before the online sex scandal that cost him his Congressional seat; Weiner is making a tentative re-entry into public life, with many wondering if he is laying the foundation for a serious campaign for mayor.
lead_paragraph: Anthony D. Weiner’s policy guide was similar to one he issued before he abandoned a 2009 run for mayor and before his sex-message scandal.

headline.seo: Weiner, Perhaps Exploring Mayoral Bid, Issues Policy Guide
headline.main: Weiner, Exploring Possible Mayoral Bid, Issues Policy Booklet With Familiar Ring
headline.print_headline: Weiner, Exploring Possible Mayoral Bid, Issues Policy Booklet With Familiar Ring
